rules.ruleString: Must be enrolled in course type {04, 05, 06, 06G, 06PG, 06PGZA, 07, 07G, 07PG, 11, 42, 50PG, 56, 76, 78}
Must be enrolled in course type {04, 05, 06, 06G, 06PG, 06PGZA, 07, 07G, 07PG, 11, 42, 50PG, 56, 76, 78}
Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {NUR5703}
Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {NUR5703}

description: Understanding the core paediatric pathophysiology is essential to caring for unwell children.This unit focuses on pathophysiological concepts that will allow nurses to accurately assess and care for paediatric patients.The theoretical knowledge gained from this unit can assist with the implementation of nursing interventions and planning care in the clinical environment.
faculty: Faculty of Medicine, Nursing and Health Sciences
